archimate:Capability.name: Strategic Architecture
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to work with business and technology leadership to develop a deep understanding of an organisations vision and goals and what the organisation needs from technology in the future. Combined with a thorough understanding of the current state and use of technology, this understanding of business aspiration and motivation can be used to develop target architectures and roadmaps that describe how the desired future can be achieved.
Outcomes:
Creation of domain and portfolio strategic views (target architectures, roadmaps, etc) Creation of business capability models Creation of business motivation models Support in creation of lean business case and solution overviews for Planning & Prioritisation
